title: entire team disconnection
body: last game our team was winning and leading massively and suddenly our entire team disconnected. when we came back all of us died and they took 2 turrets and 1 dragon so we lost the game. at the mean time , we also get super laggy (all of us) when their team comes around. can you guys please fix this and take a look where some of the players are obviously using hacks????!!!

replies.body: That's really weird, I don't see any issues with the server around that time or crashing games. Sucks this happened, though.  :(  Is everything okay now?

everything is ok except i lost the game which is not a big deal. but i do hope technical teams can look into potential drop hack for this game. I have experienced this 3 times (including this one i mentioned) during last month. All happened when we were winning the game or about to start a fight (entire team discconnect while the enemy team just fine). I do think a possible hack ware is targeting the game again and i remember it was an issue back in 2013 and a lot of account got banned back then.
